annoGroup.heading: Emergency Legislation
annoGroup.annotation: For temporary (90-day) repeal of section, see § 2404 of the Fiscal Year 2001 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2000 (D.C. Act 13-376, July 24, 2000, 47 DCR 6574).
For temporary (90 day) repeal of section, see § 2404 of the Fiscal Year 2001 Budget Support Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2000 (D.C. Act 13-438, October 20, 2000, 47 DCR 8740).

annoGroup.heading: Mayor's Orders
annoGroup.annotation: Interagency energy task force established: See Mayor’s Order 86-61, April 22, 1986.
